General.Name: Local Bounti Corp
General.Description: Local Bounti Corporation grows and packs fresh greens in the United States. It produces lettuce, arugula, spinach, and basil, herbs, berries, and loose-leaf lettuce. The company sells its products to food retailers and food service distributors. Local Bounti Corporation was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Hamilton, Montana.
General.Address: 490 Foley Lane, Hamilton, MT, United States, 59840
